page.title: 12FOURBURROW HUNT,ALLET,TRURO.
page.content: The first meet of the hunt at Four- burrows beside the A30 this season took place on Saturday, 2nd. November at 11.0am. 70 people followed on horse-back & many in cars, over the Tregavethan area where there are rights to hunt over the farmland. One fox was accounted for. The Fourburrow hounds meet every Tuesday, Saturday & alternate Thursdays & hunt over mid- Cornwall between mid-September & the end of March. The hounds are kennelled on the Scorrier estate near Redruth. The hunt followers are from all walks of life, a complete cross-section of the community including farmers, builders,hoteliers, young & old. There is no trouble from saboteurs & little evidence of any anti-hunting protest. The hunt will meet in the centre of Truro on Saturday,14th.December,always a busy Christmas shopping day.
